definition: to pour into/perfusion (med.)/to concentrate one's attention on/to teach/to inculcate/to instill
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
variant of 全神貫注|全神贯注[quan2 shen2 guan4 zhu4]

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of maltol(MT) on cerebral ischemia and reperfusion damages in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究麥芽醇對大鼠腦缺血再灌注損傷的保護作用。

sentences.english: Normal saline in the same volume was perfused in the ischemiareperfusion group and sham operation group.
sentences.chinese: 缺血再灌注組和假手術組灌等體積的生理鹽水。

sentences.english: The practice of fabricating a pile by drilling and filling pedestal is described in the discussion.
sentences.chinese: 通過工程實例介紹擴底鑽孔灌注樁施工實踐。

sentences.english: Results—Early 1-hour thrombolysis restored perfusion and reduced infarction.
sentences.chinese: 結果早期1小時溶栓恢復灌注降低梗塞體積。

sentences.english: After Gingival retraction, impressions were made and superhard gypsum model were finished.
sentences.chinese: 排齦後製取印模，灌注超硬石膏模型。

sentences.english: Then the labeled bladder cancer cells were implanted into the nude mice bladder by intravesical instillation.
sentences.chinese: 採用經尿道膀胱灌注法使腫瘤細胞種植於膀胱黏膜。

sentences.english: Beggared of blood to blush through lively veins.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏鮮血去灌注淡紅的脈絡？

sentences.english: Bore-hole cast-in-place pile was filled outside the foundation pit.
sentences.chinese: 對於基坑外的部分，採用鑽孔灌注樁補樁。

sentences.english: Method of capacity of socketed piles are determined to bring together.
sentences.chinese: 歸納總結了確定嵌巖灌注樁的承載力方法。

sentences.english: Ischemia-reperfulion injury model of small bowel transplantation was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立小腸移植缺血再灌注損傷模型。

sentences.english: Myocardial perfusion scintigraphy provides complementary data for assessing ischemic burden.
sentences.chinese: 心肌灌注閃爍照相術對缺血程度估計提供輔助資料。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the legitimation of left gastric regional arterial infusion chemotherapy in the treatment of gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃左動脈區域灌注化療治療胃癌的合理性。

sentences.english: The maintenance of higher aortic perfusion pressure intraoperatively must be emphasized to decrease the likelihood of air embolism.
sentences.chinese: 應強調術中保持較高的主動脈灌注壓以防止空氣栓塞。

sentences.english: The MR pulmonary perfusion imaging was achieved by the first-pass contrast agent method.
sentences.chinese: 利用對比劑首次通過法可進行MR肺灌注成像。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the safety of intraperitoneal hyperthermic chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腹腔溫熱灌注化療的安全性和可行性。

sentences.english: Conclusion MRPP with 2D FSPGR without breath-hold is a feasible method to diagnose APE.
sentences.chinese: 結論MR肺灌注成像是診斷肺栓塞的可行方法。

definition: variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
medical puncture to extract bodily fluid (a tap)/body piercing/puncture
pubic region/point two inches below the navel where one's qi resides
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
